description: The dark erotic world Maria inhabits is sexual abandonment present in every gesture, every slap, & caress in this theatre of passion. The mesmerizing and intense Mistress Morgana, and the kinky, ambiguous creature, TV Sabrina, light the flame and open the door to both pleasure & pain, bondage & menace, fetishism & foot worship; culminating in the hot wax torment of the slave’s most private parts as she writhes in ecstasy.
title: The Black Glove
